channel.title: Comments on: Day 16 – Getting Closer to Solving the Mystery – Friday, April 21

item.title: By: Debbie Pollak (daughter of Sarah Pollak)
item.dc:creator: Debbie Pollak (daughter of Sarah Pollak)
item.description: Hi Sue, I am so happy you are making improvement each day. Everyone at the gym is praying for your speedy recovery. We all miss your smiling face. You are now on many prayer lists in several churches. I believe God is listening to us. What the world needs now is YOU. Love and another gentle hug, Debbie
item.content:encoded:
Hi Sue, I am so happy you are making improvement each day. Everyone at the gym is praying for your speedy recovery. We all miss your smiling face.
You are now on many prayer lists in several churches. I believe God is listening to us. What the world needs now is YOU.
Love and another gentle hug, Debbie
